original_text: One day they had offered sacrifices at Shiloh. They had finished eating and drinking. Hannah stood up to pray to God. Eli the priest was sitting on his chair beside the door of the Lord's temple.
korean_text: 그들이 실로에서 먹고 마신 후에 한나가 일어나니 그 때에 제사장 엘리는 여호와의 전 문설주 곁 의자에 앉아 있었더라

sentences.original_text: One day they had offered sacrifices at Shiloh.
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 그들은 실로에서 제사를 드렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: They had finished eating and drinking.
Hannah stood up to pray to God.
Eli the priest was sitting on his chair
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리 제사장은 그의 의자에 앉아 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: beside the door of the Lord's temple.
